items.title: Gravitational-Wave Signals for Supernova Explosions of Three-Dimensional Progenitors
items.summary: arXiv:2602.02651v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Core-collapse supernovae (SNe) are sources of gravitational waves (GWs) produced by hydrodynamical instabilities and highly time-dependent anisotropies of the neutrino radiation. In this work we analyze both contributions to the GW…
